00022 static fsal_status_t __test_access(
00023     fsal_op_context_t          * p_context,          /* IN */
00024     fsal_accessflags_t         access_type,          /* IN */
00025     fsal_attrib_list_t         * p_object_attributes   /* IN */
00026 );

00028 
00060 fsal_status_t FSAL_access(
00061     fsal_handle_t              * p_object_handle,      /* IN */
00062     fsal_op_context_t          * p_context,          /* IN */
00063     fsal_accessflags_t         access_type,          /* IN */
00064     fsal_attrib_list_t         * p_object_attributes   /* [ IN/OUT ] */
00065 ){
00066 
00067   int rc;
00068   fsal_status_t status;
00069           
00070   /* sanity checks.
00071    * note : object_attributes is optionnal in FSAL_getattrs.
00072    */
00073   if (!p_object_handle || !p_context)
00074     Return(ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_access);
00075   
00076   /* 
00077    * If an error occures during getattr operation,
00078    * it is returned, even though the access operation succeeded.
00079    */
00080   
00081   if ( p_object_attributes ){
00082     
00083     FSAL_SET_MASK( p_object_attributes->asked_attributes, FSAL_ATTR_OWNER | FSAL_ATTR_GROUP | FSAL_ATTR_ACL | FSAL_ATTR_MODE);
00084     status = FSAL_getattrs( p_object_handle, p_context, p_object_attributes );
00085     
00086     /* on error, we set a special bit in the mask. */        
00087     if ( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status ) )
00088     {
00089       FSAL_CLEAR_MASK( p_object_attributes->asked_attributes );
00090       FSAL_SET_MASK( p_object_attributes->asked_attributes,
00091           FSAL_ATTR_RDATTR_ERR );
00092       Return( status.major, status.minor, INDEX_FSAL_access);
00093     }
00094     
00095     status = fsal_internal_testAccess(p_context, access_type, NULL, p_object_attributes);
00096     
00097   } else { /* p_object_attributes is NULL */
00098     fsal_attrib_list_t attrs;
00099     
00100     FSAL_CLEAR_MASK( attrs.asked_attributes );
00101     FSAL_SET_MASK( attrs.asked_attributes, FSAL_ATTR_OWNER | FSAL_ATTR_GROUP | FSAL_ATTR_ACL | FSAL_ATTR_MODE);
00102 
00103     status = FSAL_getattrs( p_object_handle, p_context, &attrs );
00104     
00105     /* on error, we set a special bit in the mask. */        
00106     if ( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status ) )
00107       Return( status.major, status.minor, INDEX_FSAL_access);
00108     
00109     status = fsal_internal_testAccess(p_context, access_type, NULL, &attrs);
00110   }
00111 
00112   Return( status.major, status.minor ,INDEX_FSAL_access );
00113   
00114 }
